data.rationale:
DESCRIPTION * Tie::PerfectHash implements "Minimal Perfect Hashing
    Algorithm".

    * Why is it? It improves hash performance under some conditions.
    E.g. Accessing a full-text search dictionary

    * Two kinds of interface are available : OO and Tie

    REFERENCE Ian H. Witten, Alistair Moffat, Timothy C. Bell. Managing
    Gigabytes 2nd. ed. : Morgan Kaufman
